item.description:
The Dark Knight Rises - bla, bla, bla. You've heard all the hype and probably paid $12 to see it already. Well fine! Come see it again for about the same price as a rental and enjoy the company of the "Cheap Date Knight" (that’s me) and similarly neuron-warped friends.

This showing is being put on by the Lecture Series Committee (LSC) at MIT. It’s student run. So be nice.

CAREFULLY READ THE DIRECTIONS ON HOW TO FIND BUILDING 26. MIT can be a black hole. You can easily enter the Infinite Corridor, get vaporized when passing by the laser lab, then reappear in a Flagstaff Arizona courtroom answering to corruption charges for a bribe you took when you were the Mayor of Wichita Falls Texas. Do let this be you! READ THE DIRECTIONS.

The movie thing at MIT is laid back. There is a concession stand with great popcorn, and you can bring in your own food (No smelly stuff please.) No alcohol, tobacco or firearms.

I’ll be there at 6:30 pm to save us some seats. I'll wait in the lobby till 6:55. Movie starts at 7:00 - unless you get stuck in Flagstaff. I’ll send my cell number out a day before just in case.
item.how_to_find_us: Read the directions on how to find 26-100. Look for me in the lobby outside.
item.name: The Dark Knight Rises @ MIT just $4!!!
